Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Lactantia PurFiltre has a creamier taste that stays fresh longer than pasteurized milk, naturally without preservatives.

Lactantia PurFiltre est un lait microfil: Le lait Lactantia PurFiltre a un goût plus pur, plus crémeux, et conserve sa fraîcheur plus longtemps que du lait ordinaire.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: A healthy diet low in saturated and trans fats may reduce the risk of heart disease. Lactantia Omega3 is low in saturated and trans fats.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: DHA is an Omega-3 fatty acid that supports normal physical development of the brain, eyes and nerves, primarily in children under two years of age.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Lactantia SkimPlus offers the same creamy taste of 2% milk with 85% less fat.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Lactantia Calcium is an easy way to get the calcium you need every day because it contains 35% more calcium than regular milk.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: A healthy diet with adequate calcium, Vitamin D and regular physical activity helps to achieve strong bones and may reduce the risk of osteoporosis.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Milk is an excellent source of calcium, which helps build strong bones and teeth.
Lactantia PurFiltre est un lait microfil: Le lait est une excellente source de calcium, souvent associé à la solidité des os et des dents.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Naturally refreshing, milk provides 16 essential nutrients that contribute to the quality of our everyday diet.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: One out of four women, and one out of eight men will suffer from osteoporosis after 50.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Chocolate and flavoured milks are as nutritious and provide the same amount of protein, vitamins and minerals as white milk.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: The quantity of Milk and Alternatives that you should consume is between 2 and 4 servings per day, depending on your age.
Lactantia PurFiltre est un lait microfil: La quantité de lait et substituts qu'il est recommandé de consommer est de 2 à 4 portions par jour, selon votre groupe d'âge.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: According to Canada's Food Guide, one serving of milk equals 1 cup (250 mL) of milk.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Before the age of two, a child should drink at least 600 mL (20 oz) of milk daily in order to meet their needs for essential nutrients.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: A cow provides an average of 90 glasses of milk a day, or over 200,000 glasses over the course of its lifetime.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Milk is the most important ingredient in hand-made ice cream, making up around 60% of the finished product.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: A nice glass of warm milk, maybe with honey, is a nutritious kind of lullaby: a true natural calmative.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Milk is unique because no other beverage contains as many natural nutrients.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Young children need the nutrients milk provides because their developing skeletal systems replace bone mass about every two years until they reach maturity.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Milk was delivered in glass bottles until plastic containers were invented in 1964.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Milk would not be frothy without its protein content.
Lactantia PurFiltre est un lait microfil: Le lait ne pourrait mousser sans les protéines qu'il contient.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Until the development of milking machines in 1894, farmers only milked about six cows each hour. Today, the average dairy farmer milks more than 100 cows per hour.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Milk is made up of 87% water, making it is an excellent choice to replace fluids.
Lactantia PurFiltre est un lait microfil: Le lait est fait à 87 % d'eau, ce qui en fait un excellent choix pour remplacer les liquides perdus.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Milk can help reduce the effects of spicy foods because of the casein protein found in it. Casein sticks to the spicy oil on your tongue to help wash it away.
Lactantia PurFiltre est un lait microfil: Le lait peut aider à réduire l'effet des aliments épicés à cause de la protéine caséine qu'il contient. La caséine colle aux huiles qui piquent votre langue pour aider à les éliminer.

Lactantia PurFiltre is a micro-filtered: Breakfast should also contain protein such as milk, cheese or yogourt as part of a balanced breakfast that includes 3 of the 4 food groups.
